## Source: amazon-inspector (d717c596833851e5babe3f45082a9ebd9cc63e982aadced615ff04fc1a162f61)
The package elf-stats-festive-workshop-566 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5b01be0a35d9cb98a3f6000da3c4bfa2cdb4cdd8986879ed4b2fb36249942b76)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-festive-workshop-566' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
